Text: Assuming this is real then only an idiot would download it. Legally it IS child porn because Traci Lords was only about 16 when she made this film.

THis might be news to you but Traci Lords' underage stuff isn't iilegal in Europe (age of consent and erotic stuff laws are different from country to country), they were aired regularily on Canal+ even in the 90's. Plus there's more of her stuff here.
OK. That is a shortcoming on my part. Here in the U.S. it is illegal to download.
In the US it is illegal to download almost *anything* posted on TPB because of copyright violations, for pete's sake.
